rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0001
rows.name: An alien mech?! What type?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0002
rows.name:
No idea. It doesn't match anything on record,
as far as I can tell. No one's seen anything like it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0003
rows.name: It looks abandoned, too. Totally ripe for the picking.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0004
rows.name: Ohhh, man, you're givin' me goosebumps![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0005
rows.name: Right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0006
rows.name: It's located here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0007
rows.name:
That's pretty deep in Noctilum...
No wonder you wanted to talk to L.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0008
rows.name: Exactly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0008_2
rows.name: But here's the rub—the Ganglion are after it, too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0009
rows.name:
From what we can tell over FrontierNav,
they've gone after it several times already—and failed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0010
rows.name:
Well, yes, that doesn't surprise us in the least.
That's tainted land.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0011
rows.name: Tainted? That doesn't sound good.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0012
rows.name: They are savage beasts! Ferocious! Insatiable![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0013
rows.name: He's talking about these.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0014
rows.name: We didn't run into anything like that in Noctilum, did we?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0015
rows.name:
The tainted are territorial.
They only dwell deep within a specific part of the forest there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0016
rows.name:
Although, it doesn't seem right
to even call it a forest anymore...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0017
rows.name: Why do you say that?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0018
rows.name:
Because the tainted devour any and all living things—
apart from other tainted, that is.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0019
rows.name: Y-you mean, even mighty Tatsu not safe?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0020
rows.name: Indeed. You would be swallowed whole.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0021
rows.name: The tainted would make no bones about you, I'm afraid.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0022
rows.name:
Interesting. They must be formidable to be
defeating the Ganglion over and over.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0023
rows.name: But if what L says is true, it could work in our favor.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0024
rows.name: Right. Our bodies are artificial mims.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0025
rows.name:
If the tainted don't perceive us as living things,
we might be safe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0026
rows.name: Let's back up a sec—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0027
rows.name: you reported all this to the commander?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0028
rows.name:
Our top priority above all else is supposed
to be searching for the Lifehold.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0029
rows.name:
Are you suggesting we set that aside
to try and recover this mech?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0030
rows.name: Exactly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0031
rows.name:
Commander Vandham is why I'm here—
he specifically requested I enlist your team.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0032
rows.name: It's just as you say—there's no time for us to screw around.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0033
rows.name: And we still absolutely need to find the Lifehold.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0034
rows.name:
But, remember—the fact is,
we're also dealing with hostile xenos here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0035
rows.name:
Xenos who destroyed Earth and want
every last one of us dead.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0036
rows.name: Xenos who also seem to want this mech—and desperately.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0037
rows.name: Hmm. And if it's that important to them...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0038
rows.name:
Right. What if it's a secret weapon
powerful enough to tip the scales?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0039
rows.name: Feels like a bit of a long shot, to be honest...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0040
rows.name: But okay.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0041
rows.name:
Even if we can't use it,
we should at least keep it from the Ganglion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0042
rows.name: Count us in.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0042_2
rows.name: Any objections?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0043
rows.name: No, ma'am![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0044
rows.name: Glad to hear it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0045
rows.name: But if we're going to take this on, we'll need to keep it quick.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0046
rows.name: Roger that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0047
rows.name: L and Tatsu: you hang back.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0048
rows.name: Unlike us, the tainted would target you guys for sure.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0049
rows.name: Oh, most considerate of you, good sirs.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0050
rows.name: Aww, Linly! Linly care about Tatsu after all![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0051
rows.name:
Well, of course!
After all this time watching over you and fattening you up,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0052
rows.name:
I'm not about to let my prize turkey
go to some rabid indigens![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06050100_MSG0053
rows.name: Meh-meh-meh-meh-meh![ST:wait ]
